name: distraction-free stackoverflow (and other stack*)
description:
Removes many information-less boxes from many sites of the stackexchange galaxy.
Also makes those sites read-only by hiding buttons and forms that are only meaningful for people having an account.
additional_info:
2021-03-31: hide the new cookie banner
2020-04-02: hide the new big banner at the top, message urging users to adopt dark theme
2019-08-08: hide the big panel at the top of stackexchange pages
2018-11-07: hide the useless GDPR warning that would come back evertytime if your browser is configured to drop cookies
2018-10-25: moar elements hidden:
- "Ask a new question" button
- "Post your answer" form
2018-06-27: hide the new distracting elements that have been recently added to Stackoverflow
 - left navigation bar
 - a fixed bottom signup panel
2018-05-28: hide "Hot network questions"
2017-03-22: hide the newsletter subscription form
css:
@-moz-document domain("stackoverflow.com"), domain("superuser.com"), domain("serverfault.com"), domain("stackapps.com"), domain("stackexchange.com"), domain("askubuntu.com") {
body > .js-dismissable-hero, /* Top of the page */
#left-sidebar,
#hero-box, .hero-box,
#herobox, .herobox, aside.s-hero, aside.js-dismissable-hero,
#hero-content, .hero-content, .hero-container
,.clc-cp-lb, .clc-cp-sb, #hireme
,#chat-feature
,.newsletter-anon
,.everyonelovesstackoverflow
,#hot-network-questions
,[aria-label="ask new question"]
,form#post-form
,.theme-selector /* Banner at the top of the page */
,.js-consent-banner /* Cookie banner */
{ display: none !important;}
}
